verbose_text: When we combine all data from the four clusters and compare the timing of initiation of transcription, the genes belonging to the same PG do not always start transcription at the same time : PG1 genes (hoxa1, hoxb1 and hoxd1) and PG2 genes (hoxa2 and hoxb2) begin transcription at different timings, while hoxc3 is expressed later than the other PG3 genes (hoxa3, hoxb3 and hoxd3) which are expressed almost at the same time (see XREF_TABLE; extrapolated onset and midpoint estimation).
